statement.name: GetContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT l1.contract_number, l1.description as contract_purpose, l1.agency_id, l1.agency_name, l1.vendor_id, l1.vendor_name as vendor_name, l1.minority_type_id, l1.original_agreement_id, l1.document_code_id, l3.document_code, CASE WHEN l1.scntrc_status = 1 THEN 'No Action Taken by Prime' WHEN l1.scntrc_status = 2 THEN 'Yes' WHEN l1.scntrc_status = 3 THEN 'No' ELSE 'N/A' END AS contract_subvendor_status, l1.original_contract_amount AS current_amount_sum, l1.maximum_contract_amount AS original_amount_sum, l2.spending_amount AS spending_amount_sum
FROM all_agreement_transactions l1
FROM all_agreement_transactions_cy l1
LEFT OUTER JOIN aggregateon_all_contracts_cumulative_spending l2 ON l2.original_agreement_id = l1.original_agreement_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code l3 ON l3.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id
'P'

statement.name: GetCountContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as record_count FROM ( SELECT l1.contract_number
FROM all_agreement_transactions l1
FROM all_agreement_transactions_cy l1
LEFT OUTER JOIN aggregateon_all_contracts_cumulative_spending l2 ON l2.original_agreement_id = l1.original_agreement_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code l3 ON l3.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id
'P'
) sub_query

statement.name: GetOgeContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, c.agency_id, c.agency_name as agency_name, d.vendor_id, d.legal_name as vendor_name, a.description AS contract_purpose, a.contract_number, a.original_agreement_id, a.document_code_id, b.document_code, 'TBD' contract_subvendor_status, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) AS dollar_difference, AVG(percent_difference) AS percent_difference FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract_number, scntrc_status FROM subcontract_status ) sd ON a.contract_number = sd.contract_number JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year, a.description,a.contract_number, a.original_agreement_id, a.document_code_id,b.document_code,c.agency_id,c.agency_name,d.vendor_id,d.legal_name
HAVING SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) != 0

statement.name: GetCountOgeContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as record_count FROM ( SELECT a.contract_number FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id
GROUP BY a.contract_number
HAVING SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) != 0
) sub_query

statement.name: GetPrimeVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, d.vendor_id, d.legal_name as vendor_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,d.vendor_id,d.legal_name

statement.name: GetCountPrimeVendors
statement.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.vendor_id) as record_count FROM aggregateon_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id

statement.name: GetAwardMethods
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, e.award_method_id, e.award_method_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_award_method e ON e.award_method_id = a.award_method_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,e.award_method_id,e.award_method_name

statement.name: GetCountAwardMethods
statement.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.award_method_id) as record_count FROM aggregateon_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id

statement.name: GetAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, e.agency_id, e.agency_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_agency e ON e.agency_id = a.agency_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,e.agency_id,e.agency_name

statement.name: GetCountAgencies
statement.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.agency_id) as record_count FROM aggregateon_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id

statement.name: GetContractsByIndustries
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, e.industry_type_id, e.industry_type_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_industry_type e ON e.industry_type_id = a.industry_type_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,e.industry_type_id,e.industry_type_name

statement.name: GetCountContractsByIndustries
statement.sql: SELECT count(a.document_code_id) as record_count FROM aggregateon_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id

statement.name: GetContractsBySize
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, e.award_size_id, e.award_size_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_award_size e ON e.award_size_id = a.award_size_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,e.award_size_id,e.award_size_name

statement.name: GetCountContractsBySize
statement.sql: SELECT count(a.document_code_id) as record_count FROM aggregateon_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id

statement.name: GetPrimeContractSubVenReporting
statement.sql: SELECT ra.agency_id AS agency_id, ra.agency_name AS agency_name, COUNT(DISTINCT a.contract_number) as number_contracts, SUM(rfed_amount) AS spending_amount_sum, SUM(CASE WHEN a.scntrc_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_response_status, SUM(CASE WHEN a.scntrc_status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN a.scntrc_status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_no_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN a.scntrc_status = 2 AND sd.contract_number IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_no_details_count FROM agreement_snapshot a left join ref_agency ra ON a.agency_id = ra.agency_id left join (select distinct contract_number FROM subcontract_details WHERE latest_flag='Y') sd ON a.contract_number = sd.contract_number WHERE a.latest_flag='Y' AND a.document_code_id in (1,2) AND (117 BETWEEN a.effective_begin_year_id AND a.effective_end_year_id) AND (117 BETWEEN a.starting_year_id AND a.ending_year_id) GROUP BY ra.agency_id, ra.agency_name

statement.name: GetCountPrimeContractSubVenReporting
statement.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as record_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT agency_id AS agency_id FROM agreement_snapshot a WHERE a.latest_flag='Y' AND a.document_code_id in (1,2) AND (117 BETWEEN a.effective_begin_year_id AND a.effective_end_year_id) AND (117 BETWEEN a.starting_year_id AND a.ending_year_id) ) sub_query
